title: Barbaroslar: Akdeniz'in Kılıcı
overview: "Barbaroslar Akdeniz'in Kılıcı" is a Turkish historical drama series that follows the life and adventures of the Barbarossa brothers, Oruç and Hızır, who were Ottoman privateers and admirals in the 16th century. The series portrays their military campaigns against various European powers, as well as their personal lives and relationships.
